title: BEN Streetwear Crib
shortDescription: High-performance streetwear e-commerce platform with a modern fashion-first UX.

details.tagline: A scalable, conversion-focused fashion e-commerce experience.
details.about:
BEN Streetwear Crib is a full-stack e-commerce platform designed for modern fashion brands. The focus was on speed, usability, and clean visual hierarchy to maximize conversions.

The platform includes dynamic product listings, cart management, user authentication, and a scalable backend using Firebase. The UI was designed in Figma and implemented with Tailwind CSS and shadCN UI for a premium streetwear aesthetic.

features.title: Full E-Commerce Flow
features.description: Product browsing, cart management, and checkout-ready architecture.

features.title: Secure Authentication
features.description: Firebase-based authentication with protected user sessions.

features.title: Optimized Performance
features.description: Fast page loads and smooth interactions deployed on Vercel.

features.title: Rich UI/UX Design
features.description: Intuitive navigation, clean layouts, and a focus on user engagement.

challenges: State synchronization between Redux and Context API.
Maintaining consistent UX across responsive breakpoints.
